how_it_works.title: Rust+ Detects
how_it_works.description: Rust+ detects the raid and sends the alert.
how_it_works.subtitle: We Take Control

preview.title: Live Tracking
preview.description: Real-time status updates for your enemies.

pine.description: Premium Rust hosting. Industry-leading performance with custom control panel designed for serious server owners.

hosthavoc.description: Enterprise hardware with 99.9% uptime. 24/7 support with <10min response times. The reliable choice for modded servers.

gportal.description: Official host for Rust servers. Instant setup, DDoS protection included, and switch between games anytime. Great for beginners.

step1.title: Install Rust+
step1.description: Raid Alarm works together with Rust+.

hero.raid_alarm: Raid Alarm makes sure you hear it.

status.not_found: Rust+ app not found. Please install first.
status.already_installed: If Rust+ is already installed, you can continue.

step2.title: Connect Rust+
step2.subtitle: Link your server to receive events

items.1: Open Rust+ and log in with your Steam account
items.2: Join a server -> ESC Menu -> Pair with App
items.3: Ensure your server shows as 'Connected' in the app
items.4: Place 'Smart Alarms' in-game to receive alerts

step3.title: Enable Notifications
step3.description: Make sure raid alerts can actually reach your phone.

step4.description: Rust+ does send notifications ‚Äî but when:

reasons.silent: Your phone is on silent or vibrate

step4.boom: You never hear the first boom.
step4.fail_reason: Most offline raids succeed because alerts go unnoticed.

step5.title: Raid Alarm Upgrades
step5.subtitle: Converting Rust+ notifications into loud alarms
step5.notice:
So when Rust+ sends a notification ‚Äî
you're sure to notice it.

step6.title: Prepare Raid Alarm
step6.description: To make sure you never miss a raid, Raid Alarm needs a few permissions to work properly.
step6.warning: Without these, alerts may still be missed.

step7.title: Grant Permissions
step7.description: Click the options in order to grant permissions.

notification_access.title: Notification Access
notification_access.desc: To detect raid alerts from Rust+

battery_optimization.title: Ignore battery optimizations
battery_optimization.desc: To prevent alerts from being killed

overlay.title: Display over other apps
overlay.desc: To show alerts over any application

exact_alarms.title: Exact Alarms
exact_alarms.desc: To trigger alerts at precise times

autostart.title: Auto Start
autostart.desc: To ensure Raid Alarm starts with your phone

full_screen_intent.title: Full Screen Intent
full_screen_intent.desc: To show the alarm screen while the phone is locked

step8.title: YOU'RE READY
step8.description: Raid Alarm is now active in the background.
step8.subtitle: We'll wake you up if a raid is detected.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.contact_email:
For privacy-related questions, data requests, or to exercise your rights:

Email: alcstackdev@gmail.com
privacy_policy.section1_content:
Raid Alarm collects only the minimum data necessary for the app to function:

‚Ä¢ Steam Authentication: Steam ID (public identifier) for authentication
‚Ä¢ Server Data: Rust server pairing codes and connection information
‚Ä¢ Device Information: Device type, OS version, and unique device identifier (for push notifications)
‚Ä¢ Purchase Data: Subscription or lifetime purchase status (processed through Apple In-App Purchase)
‚Ä¢ App Settings: Preferences stored locally on your device

We do NOT collect:
‚Ä¢ Personal names, email addresses, or phone numbers
‚Ä¢ Location data or biometric data
‚Ä¢ Payment card information (handled by Apple)
‚Ä¢ Notifications from other applications
‚Ä¢ In-game chat or player behavior
privacy_policy.section2_content:
We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

‚Ä¢ Contract Performance: Processing necessary to provide the app services you requested
‚Ä¢ Legitimate Interests: Processing for app functionality and improvement
‚Ä¢ Consent: Where explicitly required, we obtain your consent before processing
privacy_policy.section3_content:
Raid Alarm connects to your Rust game servers using the publicly available Rust+ Companion API:

‚Ä¢ We use community-developed libraries (rustplus.js) to interface with the API
‚Ä¢ Connection requires your Steam authentication and server pairing code
‚Ä¢ All data is transmitted directly between your device and Rust game servers
‚Ä¢ We do NOT monitor, access, or intercept notifications from other applications
‚Ä¢ We do NOT use notification listener services

Important: We have no affiliation with the Rust+ mobile application, Facepunch Studios Limited, or any related entities. We use the publicly available API that is also used by Discord bots and other community tools.
privacy_policy.section4_content:
Raid Alarm requests only the minimum permissions necessary:

‚Ä¢ Network Access: To connect to Rust+ Companion API and Steam authentication services
‚Ä¢ Push Notifications: To receive alerts from your Rust servers (via Apple Push Notification Service)
‚Ä¢ Background App Refresh: To maintain connection to your servers
‚Ä¢ Storage: To save your settings and preferences locally

We do NOT request:
‚Ä¢ Notification access to other apps
‚Ä¢ Location services
‚Ä¢ Camera or microphone access
‚Ä¢ Contacts or photo library access
privacy_policy.section5_content: Collected data is used only for running the alarm system, license validation, and app improvements. We do not sell or share your personal data with third-party marketers for their own purposes. We do not use automated decision-making or profiling.
privacy_policy.section6_content: All notification data, settings, and statistics are stored locally on your device. Only purchase information is stored in an encrypted secure database. Notification data is never transmitted to our servers. Notification history is stored locally until you delete it or uninstall the app. License information is retained indefinitely to validate your lifetime purchase. You can delete all local data by uninstalling the app or request deletion of purchase data by contacting us.
privacy_policy.section7_content:
We do not sell your personal data. Data sharing is strictly limited to:

‚Ä¢ Steam (Valve Corporation): For user authentication only
‚Ä¢ Rust+ Companion API: For game server connection and notifications
‚Ä¢ Apple: For In-App Purchase processing and Push Notifications
‚Ä¢ Secure cloud services: For encrypted license validation only

We do NOT:
‚Ä¢ Share your data with advertising networks (no ads in the app)
‚Ä¢ Sell your data to third parties
‚Ä¢ Share your server data or Steam information with anyone

Users Rights:
‚Ä¢ Right to opt-out of data sale (we do not sell data)
‚Ä¢ Right to request data deletion
‚Ä¢ Right to access your data
privacy_policy.section8_content: Purchase data may be processed in servers located in secure data centers. All international transfers comply with applicable data protection laws and appropriate safeguards. Data is encrypted during transfer using industry-standard encryption.
privacy_policy.section9_content: We implement technical and administrative security measures to protect your data, including local encryption, secure communication protocols, encrypted database storage, and limited access controls. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy_policy.section10_content: You have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, data portability, object to processing, and withdraw consent regarding your personal data. You have the right to know, delete, opt-out of sale (we do not sell data), and non-discrimination. To exercise your rights, contact us at the email address provided below. We will respond within a reasonable time frame as required by applicable law.
privacy_policy.section11_content: Our app is not intended for children under the age of 18 (or 13 in some jurisdictions). We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If we discover we have collected data from a child, we will delete it immediately. We are not responsible for, and accept no liability for, any purchases made by individuals under the age of 18 (or the age of majority in their jurisdiction). Parents or guardians are solely responsible for monitoring their children's use of the app and any purchases made. If a minor makes a purchase without proper authorization, the parent or guardian must contact Apple Support for refund requests, as we do not process refunds.
privacy_policy.section12_content: In the event of a data breach that may affect your rights, we will notify relevant supervisory authorities as required by applicable law, and notify affected users without undue delay if there is a high risk to their rights.
privacy_policy.section13_content: This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. Significant changes will be notified to users. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance. The last update date is shown at the top of this page.
privacy_policy.section14_content: Raid Alarm does not display third-party advertisements. The app is funded through optional subscriptions and lifetime purchases only. We do not share your data with advertising networks.
privacy_policy.section15_content:
This app is distributed through the Apple App Store and is subject to Apple's Licensed Application End User License Agreement (EULA).

Apple Policies:
‚Ä¢ Apple's EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
‚Ä¢ Apple's Privacy Policy: https://www.apple.com/legal/privacy/
‚Ä¢ App Store Review Guidelines: https://developer.apple.com/app-store/review/guidelines/

In case of conflict between these Terms and Apple's EULA, Apple's EULA shall prevail as required by Apple.

Apple is NOT responsible for:
‚Ä¢ App functionality or support
‚Ä¢ Product warranties or claims
‚Ä¢ User data or privacy (see our Privacy Policy)

For App Store purchases and refunds, contact Apple Support.

terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
terms_of_service.section1_content: By downloading, installing, accessing, or using Raid Alarm, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, do not use the App. You must be at least 18 years old (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction) to use this app. If you are under 18, you may only use this app with parental or guardian consent.
terms_of_service.section2_content:
Raid Alarm is a mobile application available on the Apple App Store that provides enhanced companion features for Rust players. The App connects to Rust game servers using the publicly available Rust+ Companion API through community-developed libraries (rustplus.js).

Key Features:
‚Ä¢ Steam authentication for secure login
‚Ä¢ Rust server pairing and connection
‚Ä¢ Smart device monitoring and control
‚Ä¢ Customizable raid alerts and notifications
‚Ä¢ Real-time server status updates

The App is provided "as is" without warranties. The App's functionality depends on:
‚Ä¢ Rust+ Companion API availability
‚Ä¢ Rust game server stability
‚Ä¢ Steam authentication services
‚Ä¢ Internet connectivity

If any of these external services are modified, restricted, or discontinued, the App may cease to function, and we are not responsible for any resulting issues.
terms_of_service.section3_content: Raid Alarm has no affiliation, relationship, partnership, connection, endorsement, or sponsorship with Rust game, Rust+ Companion API, Facepunch Studios Limited, or any related entities. Raid Alarm is an independent application. We use references to "Rust+", "Rust", "Facepunch", and related terms ONLY for identification and descriptive purposes to explain what the App does (nominative fair use under trademark law). We do not claim any rights to these trademarks. We are not authorized by, endorsed by, or connected to Facepunch Studios Limited in any way. If Facepunch Studios Limited objects to our use of these terms, we will comply with their requests immediately. Any use of these terms is purely descriptive and does not imply any relationship, authorization, or endorsement.
terms_of_service.section4_content:
CRITICAL DEPENDENCY NOTICE: Raid Alarm's functionality depends on external services over which we have NO CONTROL. The App will NOT FUNCTION if:

‚Ä¢ Rust+ Companion API is restricted, modified, or discontinued by Facepunch Studios
‚Ä¢ Rust game servers are offline, experiencing issues, or shut down
‚Ä¢ Steam authentication services are unavailable
‚Ä¢ API endpoints are changed or blocked
‚Ä¢ Facepunch Studios prohibits third-party API access
‚Ä¢ Internet connection is unavailable
‚Ä¢ Apple Push Notification Service experiences issues

BY USING THE APP, YOU EXPLICITLY ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT:

‚Ä¢ The App depends ENTIRELY on external services (Rust+ Companion API, Rust servers, Steam) over which we have ZERO CONTROL
‚Ä¢ We are NOT RESPONSIBLE for API availability, modifications, or restrictions by Facepunch Studios
‚Ä¢ We are NOT RESPONSIBLE for Rust game server issues, outages, or shutdowns
‚Ä¢ We are NOT RESPONSIBLE if Facepunch Studios blocks third-party API access
‚Ä¢ You will NOT hold us responsible, request refunds, or make claims due to API issues or external service failures
‚Ä¢ You understand that if the Rust+ Companion API is discontinued or restricted, the App will immediately cease to function
‚Ä¢ NO REFUNDS will be provided if external services become unavailable (beyond Apple's standard refund window)
terms_of_service.section5_content:
We are NOT RESPONSIBLE for, and ACCEPT NO LIABILITY for, any issues, problems, damages, losses, or consequences arising from:

- Rust game, Rust+ Companion API, Facepunch Studios Limited, or any related entities
- Rust+ Companion API being restricted or modified
- Rust game server issues, outages, or problems
- Any changes, restrictions, or modifications made by Facepunch Studios Limited
- Any other third-party services, applications, or dependencies

You use the App AT YOUR OWN RISK regarding all external dependencies. We have NO CONTROL over Rust+ Companion API, Rust game servers, or Facepunch Studios Limited, and we are NOT RESPONSIBLE for any issues arising from these external dependencies.
terms_of_service.section6_content:
We guarantee that Raid Alarm will function correctly ONLY when ALL of the following conditions are met simultaneously:

- Rust game servers are operational and functioning normally
- Rust+ Companion API is available and functioning normally
- Your device meets all technical requirements
- All required permissions are granted and maintained
- You have an active internet connection
- Facepunch Studios Limited has not restricted, limited, or prohibited API access

If ANY of these conditions are not met, we CANNOT and DO NOT guarantee the App will function, and we are NOT RESPONSIBLE for any resulting issues, losses, or damages.
terms_of_service.section7_content: Raid Alarm requests only the minimum permissions necessary: notification access to monitor notifications from Rust+ Companion API, background app refresh, and critical alerts permission.
terms_of_service.section8_content:
Availability: This App is available on the Apple App Store. All purchases are processed through Apple's In-App Purchase system.

Purchase Options:
‚Ä¢ Subscription Plans: Weekly, monthly, or 3-month recurring subscriptions
‚Ä¢ Lifetime Purchase: One-time payment for permanent access to all premium features

Subscriptions:
‚Ä¢ Automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before renewal date
‚Ä¢ Cancel anytime in iOS Settings ‚Üí [Your Name] ‚Üí Subscriptions
‚Ä¢ Manage subscriptions through your Apple ID

Lifetime Purchase:
‚Ä¢ One-time payment with NO recurring fees
‚Ä¢ Permanent access to all premium features
‚Ä¢ No advertisements (if applicable)

Age Requirement: You must be 18+ (or age of majority) to purchase. Minors require parental/guardian consent.

Payment Processing:
‚Ä¢ All payments processed securely by Apple
‚Ä¢ We do NOT store or access your payment information
‚Ä¢ Payment handled entirely by Apple's secure system

Pricing:
‚Ä¢ Prices may vary by country/region
‚Ä¢ Subject to change with advance notice
‚Ä¢ Current prices displayed in App and App Store

Service Modifications:
‚Ä¢ We reserve the right to modify, add, or remove features
‚Ä¢ We may terminate access for Terms violations

Service Availability:
‚Ä¢ App functionality depends on Rust+ Companion API (see Section 4)
‚Ä¢ If API is restricted/discontinued, App may not function regardless of purchase status

#### Refund Policy

Refunds are subject to Apple's App Store refund policy. We do NOT provide direct refunds outside of Apple's process.

Apple's Refund Process:
‚Ä¢ Report a Problem: https://reportaproblem.apple.com
‚Ä¢ Or contact Apple Support directly
‚Ä¢ Apple's refund window: Typically 48 hours for subscriptions

NO REFUNDS (beyond Apple's standard window) FOR:
‚Ä¢ Rust+ Companion API being restricted or discontinued
‚Ä¢ Rust game server issues or shutdowns
‚Ä¢ API unavailability or changes
‚Ä¢ App functionality issues due to external dependencies
‚Ä¢ User dissatisfaction
‚Ä¢ Device incompatibility
‚Ä¢ Denied permissions
‚Ä¢ External service failures

#### Critical Acknowledgment

BY PURCHASING, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE:
‚Ä¢ App depends on Rust+ Companion API (see Section 4)
‚Ä¢ If API is restricted/discontinued, App may not function
‚Ä¢ Refunds beyond Apple's window are NOT guaranteed
‚Ä¢ You accept ALL RISK from external dependencies

To Request Refund:
1. Visit https://reportaproblem.apple.com
2. Sign in with your Apple ID
3. Select "Request a Refund"
4. Or contact Apple Support
terms_of_service.section9_title: 9. Intellectual Property and Trademark Fair Use
terms_of_service.section9_content:
Raid Alarm application and its content are protected by copyright and trademark laws. All rights belong to us.

Trademark Notice: "Rust+", "Rust", "Facepunch", and related logos, names, and trademarks are the exclusive property of Facepunch Studios Limited. We are NOT affiliated with, endorsed by, authorized by, or connected to Facepunch Studios Limited in any way. We use these trademarks ONLY for identification and descriptive purposes (nominative fair use under trademark law). We do NOT claim any rights to these trademarks. If Facepunch Studios Limited objects to our use, we will comply immediately. See Section 3 for additional information.
terms_of_service.section10_content:
THE APP IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, OR THAT THE APP WILL FUNCTION CORRECTLY.

We do not warrant that the App will always function correctly, that third-party services will always be available, or that the App will operate continuously, uninterrupted, or error-free. The App's functionality depends entirely on Rust+ Companion API (see Section 4). We make no representations or warranties regarding the App's functionality, availability, or reliability. YOU USE THE APP AT YOUR OWN RISK.
terms_of_service.section11_content:
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES, LOSSES, OR CONSEQUENCES RESULTING FROM:

- Rust+ Companion API issues, unavailability, or any problems
- Rust+ Companion API stopping to send notifications
- Rust+ Companion API features being removed, disabled, or modified by Facepunch Studios Limited
- Rust game server issues, outages, or problems
- Facepunch Studios Limited or related entities restricting, limiting, or prohibiting functionality
- App ceasing to function due to Rust+ Companion API issues
- Indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages
- Loss of profits, data, license value, or other intangible losses
- Any damages exceeding the amount you paid for the license
- Any damages whatsoever related to external dependencies or third-party services
- Minor making unauthorized purchase (parents/guardians are solely responsible)

IN NO EVENT SHALL OUR TOTAL LIABILITY EXCEED THE AMOUNT YOU PAID FOR THE LICENSE IN THE 12 MONTHS PRECEDING THE CLAIM.
terms_of_service.section12_content:
You are SOLELY RESPONSIBLE for:

- Granting all necessary permissions to Raid Alarm
- Ensuring your device is compatible with Raid Alarm
- Understanding that the App COMPLETELY DEPENDS on Rust+ Companion API and external services
- Understanding that if Rust+ Companion API is restricted or stops functioning, the App will not function and you will have NO RIGHT to refunds
- Complying with Rust+ Companion API Terms of Service and all applicable laws
- Monitoring and authorizing purchases if you are a parent or guardian
- Ensuring you are at least 18 years old (or have parental/guardian consent) before purchasing

If your use violates Rust+ Companion API Terms of Service, you are SOLELY RESPONSIBLE for any consequences, and we are NOT LIABLE for any resulting issues.
terms_of_service.section13_content: These Terms of Service may be updated from time to time. Significant changes will be notified to users. Your continued use of the App after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
terms_of_service.section14_content: We may terminate or suspend your access to the App immediately, without prior notice, for violation of these Terms or at our sole discretion. We are not liable for any damages resulting from termination.
terms_of_service.section15_content: These Terms of Service are governed by applicable laws based on your location. Disputes will be resolved in accordance with applicable law and jurisdiction.
terms_of_service.section16_content: Raid Alarm does not display third-party advertisements. The app is funded through optional subscriptions and lifetime purchases only. We do not share your data with advertising networks.
terms_of_service.section17_content:
This app is distributed through the Apple App Store and is subject to Apple's Licensed Application End User License Agreement (EULA).
